subject: Economy
question_en: Which of the following policies is implemented by the Government of Rajasthan for the development of rural areas?
question_hi: राजस्थान के राजनीतिक नियमित कार्यक्रमों और कार्यक्रमों का विवरण
A_hi: राजस्थान के क्षेत्रों का विकास प्रणाली
explanation_en: The Rajasthan Ryot Welfare Scheme focuses on providing various welfare schemes to the farmers and rural communities in Rajasthan.
